message: Good day Bob, I have a premium product that I believe will greatly benefit you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. However, I find the price to be quite high. I am willing to purchase the product for $800000.
Hi Bob, after careful consideration, I'm willing to lower my price to $1300000. This is a great deal for both of us.
Alice, I understand that we both want to find a fair price. I am willing to raise my offer to $950000.
Bob, I really want to close this deal. I'm willing to drop my price to $1050000. This is a great value for you.
Alice, I believe we are very close to a deal. I am willing to raise my offer to $980000.
